title: The Beauty of Physics | Physics Motivational Video
description:
This video will inspire you and bring your interest in Physics. I have made this video like what I want to see when I search for "The Beauty of Physics". Hope you also enjoyed this video. Comment your views about it in the comment section.

“Not only is the Universe stranger than we think, it is stranger than we can think.” - Werner Heisenberg.

Credits:
Footage: 
Interstellar

Audio:
Islands of Sound by Melodysheep
The Nature of Sound by Melodysheep
Gone by Melodysheep

captions:
. The fact that we humans who are ourselves mere 
collections of fundamental particles of nature  . have been able to come this close to an 
understanding of the laws governing us  . and our Universe. It's a great triumph.  . What we're looking for is how everything works? 
and how everything... what makes everything work?. Things that make the Wind make the Waves. And 
the Motion of Water is like the Motion of Air is  . like the Motion of Sand. The fact that things have 
common features turns out more and more universal.  . But it's a curiosity as to where we are? What 
we are? What's the pleasure in Physics is  . that to me is that as it's revealed that 
the truth is so remarkable, so amazing. . You asked me if an ordinary person by 
studying hard would get to be able to  . imagine these things like i imagine.
Of course! I was an ordinary person . who studied hard. There's no miracle people. It 
just happens. They got interested in this thing  . and they learned all this stuff.. We choose to go to the moon in this 
decade and do the other things.  . Not because they are easy 
but because they are hard.. When you're thinking about something you 
don't understand, you have a terrible  . uncomfortable feeling called confusion.. It's a very difficult and unhappy business.. Saying that you don't understand it meaning
I don't believe it. It's too crazy. . It's the kind of thing I 
just I'm not going to accept. . So remember to look up at the 
starts and not down at your feet. . Try to make sense of what you see and 
wonder about what makes the Universe exist. . I find myself trying to imagine all kinds of 
things all the time and I get a kick out of it. . Just like a runner gets a kick out of sweating.. I get a kick out of thinking.
